casebody.data:
In re Election Protest of Dr. Trudy WADE. No. 717P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 4, 2006. Robert N. Hunter, Jr., Greensboro, Michael Crowell, Raleigh, for Trudy Wade. Susan K. Nichols, Alexander McC. Peters, Karen E. Long, Special Deputy Attorney Generals, for Board of Elections. Larry Moore, Greensboro, for John Parks.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Petitioner (Trudy Wade) on the 21st day of March 2006 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the Superior Court, Wake County, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court of that County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th day of May 2006."

Justices PARKER, EDMUNDS and MARTIN recused.
